General.Name: NEFAZ Publicly Traded Company
General.Description: NEFAZ Publicly Traded Company operates in the automobile industry in Russia. It produces buses, tank trucks, flatbed trailers, crew buses, fire fighting equipment, semi-trailers, tank semi-trailers, tank trailers, dump trucks, tipper semi-trailers, tipper trailers, flatbed trailers, and agricultural machinery, as well as car chassis and spare parts. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Neftekamsk, Russia. NEFAZ Publicly Traded Company is a subsidiary of KAMAZ Publicly Traded Company.
